content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 FIRST_ROW=2,
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'container2_koushikstorageacc_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [container2_koushikstorageacc] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'https://koushikstorageacc.dfs.core.windows.net/container2', 
		
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE first_table (
	[id] nvarchar(4000),
	[Name] nvarchar(4000),
	[Age] nvarchar(4000),
	[Gender] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'helo.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [container2_koushikstorageacc],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.first_table
GO
